name: Sankt Anna by MLearning.ai
description: "The master is gone. He passed away in January this year (2019 ). But his son, Dariusz Gross, who is also an artist, is not letting his father fade into oblivion. – I want to ensure my father’s immortality – he says. I am not talking about immortality in human terms, obviously. I am talking about the artistic immortality..." https://www.sztucznainteligencja.org.pl/en/in-the-name-of-the-father-an-immortal-sculptor/ DATAsculpture generated by https://twitter.com/Mlearning_ai
